00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00042 
00043 #include <obd_support.h>
00044 #include <lustre_handles.h>
00045 #include <lustre_lib.h>
00046 
00047 
00048 static __u64 handle_base;
00049 #define HANDLE_INCR 7
00050 static spinlock_t handle_base_lock;
00051 
00052 static struct handle_bucket {
00053         spinlock_t       lock;
00054         struct list_head head;
00055 } *handle_hash;
00056 
00057 #define HANDLE_HASH_SIZE (1 << 16)
00058 #define HANDLE_HASH_MASK (HANDLE_HASH_SIZE - 1)
00059 
00060 /*
00061  * Generate a unique 64bit cookie (hash) for a handle and insert it into
00062  * global (per-node) hash-table.
00063  */
00064 void class_handle_hash(struct portals_handle *h,
00065                        struct portals_handle_ops *ops)
00066 {
00067         struct handle_bucket *bucket;
00068         ENTRY;
00069 
00070         LASSERT(h != NULL);
00071         LASSERT(list_empty(&h->h_link));
00072 
00073         /*
00074          * This is fast, but simplistic cookie generation algorithm, it will
00075          * need a re-do at some point in the future for security.
00076          */
00077         spin_lock(&handle_base_lock);
00078         handle_base += HANDLE_INCR;
00079 
00080         if (unlikely(handle_base == 0)) {
00081                 /*
00082                  * Cookie of zero is "dangerous", because in many places it's
00083                  * assumed that 0 means "unassigned" handle, not bound to any
00084                  * object.
00085                  */
00086                 CWARN("The universe has been exhausted: cookie wrap-around.\n");
00087                 handle_base += HANDLE_INCR;
00088         }
00089         h->h_cookie = handle_base;
00090         spin_unlock(&handle_base_lock);
00091 
00092         h->h_ops = ops;
00093         spin_lock_init(&h->h_lock);
00094 
00095         bucket = &handle_hash[h->h_cookie & HANDLE_HASH_MASK];
00096         spin_lock(&bucket->lock);
00097         list_add_rcu(&h->h_link, &bucket->head);
00098         h->h_in = 1;
00099         spin_unlock(&bucket->lock);
00100 
00101         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "added object %p with handle "LPX64" to hash\n",
00102                h, h->h_cookie);
00103         EXIT;
00104 }
00105 EXPORT_SYMBOL(class_handle_hash);
00106 
00107 static void class_handle_unhash_nolock(struct portals_handle *h)
00108 {
00109         if (list_empty(&h->h_link)) {
00110                 CERROR("removing an already-removed handle ("LPX64")\n",
00111                        h->h_cookie);
00112                 return;
00113         }
00114 
00115         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "removing object %p with handle "LPX64" from hash\n",
00116                h, h->h_cookie);
00117 
00118         spin_lock(&h->h_lock);
00119         if (h->h_in == 0) {
00120                 spin_unlock(&h->h_lock);
00121                 return;
00122         }
00123         h->h_in = 0;
00124         spin_unlock(&h->h_lock);
00125         list_del_rcu(&h->h_link);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void class_handle_unhash(struct portals_handle *h)
00129 {
00130         struct handle_bucket *bucket;
00131         bucket = handle_hash + (h->h_cookie & HANDLE_HASH_MASK);
00132 
00133         spin_lock(&bucket->lock);
00134         class_handle_unhash_nolock(h);
00135         spin_unlock(&bucket->lock);
00136 }
00137 EXPORT_SYMBOL(class_handle_unhash);
00138 
00139 void class_handle_hash_back(struct portals_handle *h)
00140 {
00141         struct handle_bucket *bucket;
00142         ENTRY;
00143 
00144         bucket = handle_hash + (h->h_cookie & HANDLE_HASH_MASK);
00145 
00146         spin_lock(&bucket->lock);
00147         list_add_rcu(&h->h_link, &bucket->head);
00148         h->h_in = 1;
00149         spin_unlock(&bucket->lock);
00150 
00151         EXIT;
00152 }
00153 EXPORT_SYMBOL(class_handle_hash_back);
00154 
00155 void *class_handle2object(__u64 cookie, const void *owner)
00156 {
00157         struct handle_bucket *bucket;
00158         struct portals_handle *h;
00159         void *retval = NULL;
00160         ENTRY;
00161 
00162         LASSERT(handle_hash != NULL);
00163 
00164         /* Be careful when you want to change this code. See the
00165          * rcu_read_lock() definition on top this file. - jxiong */
00166         bucket = handle_hash + (cookie & HANDLE_HASH_MASK);
00167 
00168         rcu_read_lock();
00169         list_for_each_entry_rcu(h, &bucket->head, h_link) {
00170                 if (h->h_cookie != cookie || h->h_owner != owner)
00171                         continue;
00172 
00173                 spin_lock(&h->h_lock);
00174                 if (likely(h->h_in != 0)) {
00175                         h->h_ops->hop_addref(h);
00176                         retval = h;
00177                 }
00178                 spin_unlock(&h->h_lock);
00179                 break;
00180         }
00181         rcu_read_unlock();
00182 
00183         RETURN(retval);
00184 }
00185 EXPORT_SYMBOL(class_handle2object);
00186 
00187 void class_handle_free_cb(struct rcu_head *rcu)
00188 {
00189         struct portals_handle *h;
00190         void *ptr;
00191 
00192         h = container_of(rcu, struct portals_handle, h_rcu);
00193         ptr = (void *)(unsigned long)h->h_cookie;
00194 
00195         if (h->h_ops->hop_free != NULL)
00196                 h->h_ops->hop_free(ptr, h->h_size);
00197         else
00198                 OBD_FREE(ptr, h->h_size);
00199 }
00200 EXPORT_SYMBOL(class_handle_free_cb);
00201 
00202 int class_handle_init(void)
00203 {
00204         struct handle_bucket *bucket;
00205         struct timeval tv;
00206         int seed[2];
00207 
00208         LASSERT(handle_hash == NULL);
00209 
00210         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(handle_hash, sizeof(*bucket) * HANDLE_HASH_SIZE);
00211         if (handle_hash == NULL)
00212                 return -ENOMEM;
00213 
00214         spin_lock_init(&handle_base_lock);
00215         for (bucket = handle_hash + HANDLE_HASH_SIZE - 1; bucket >= handle_hash;
00216              bucket--) {
00217                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bucket->head);
00218                 spin_lock_init(&bucket->lock);
00219         }
00220 
00222         cfs_get_random_bytes(seed, sizeof(seed));
00223         do_gettimeofday(&tv);
00224         cfs_srand(tv.tv_sec ^ seed[0], tv.tv_usec ^ seed[1]);
00225 
00226         cfs_get_random_bytes(&handle_base, sizeof(handle_base));
00227         LASSERT(handle_base != 0ULL);
00228 
00229         return 0;
00230 }
00231 
00232 static int cleanup_all_handles(void)
00233 {
00234         int rc;
00235         int i;
00236 
00237         for (rc = i = 0; i < HANDLE_HASH_SIZE; i++) {
00238                 struct portals_handle *h;
00239 
00240                 spin_lock(&handle_hash[i].lock);
00241                 list_for_each_entry_rcu(h, &(handle_hash[i].head), h_link) {
00242                         CERROR("force clean handle "LPX64" addr %p ops %p\n",
00243                                h->h_cookie, h, h->h_ops);
00244 
00245                         class_handle_unhash_nolock(h);
00246                         rc++;
00247                 }
00248                 spin_unlock(&handle_hash[i].lock);
00249         }
00250 
00251         return rc;
00252 }
00253 
00254 void class_handle_cleanup(void)
00255 {
00256         int count;
00257         LASSERT(handle_hash != NULL);
00258 
00259         count = cleanup_all_handles();
00260 
00261         OBD_FREE_LARGE(handle_hash, sizeof(*handle_hash) * HANDLE_HASH_SIZE);
00262         handle_hash = NULL;
00263 
00264         if (count != 0)
00265                 CERROR("handle_count at cleanup: %d\n", count);
00266 }
